## PassState.blendingEnabled property

When defined, this overrides the blending property of a [DrawCommand](./toygl.drawcommand.md)<!-- -->'s render state. This is used to, for example, to allow the renderer to turn off blending during the picking pass. <p> When this is <code>undefined</code>, the [DrawCommand](./toygl.drawcommand.md)<!-- -->'s property is used. </p>

**Signature:**

```typescript
blendingEnabled: boolean;
```
